00035 
00036 Entree& Milieu_composite::readOn(Entree& is)
00037 {
00038   int i = 0;
00039   std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> especes;
00040   Nom mot;
00041   is >> mot;
00042   if (mot != "{") Cerr << "Milieu_composite : { expected instead of " << mot << finl, Process::exit();
00043   for (is >> mot; mot != "}"; is >> mot)
00044     {
00045       Cerr << "Milieu_composite : ajout de " << mot << " ... ";
00046       if (Interprete::objet_existant(mot))
00047         {
00048           Fluide_base& fluide = ref_cast(Fluide_base, Interprete::objet(mot));
00049           fluide.set_id_composite(i++);
00050           fluides.add(fluide);
00051           especes.push_back(check_fluid_name(fluide.le_nom()));
00052           Cerr << "ok!" << finl;
00053         }
00054       else Process::exit("not found!");
00055     }
00056 
00057 // saturation
00058   int N = fluides.size();
00059   for (int n = 0; n < N; n++)
00060     {
00061       std::vector<Saturation_base *> satn;
00062       for (int m = 0; m < N; m++)
00063         {
00064           const std::string espn = especes[n].first, espm = especes[m].first;
00065           const int pn = especes[n].second, pm = especes[m].second;
00066           mot = Nom((std::string("saturation_") + especes[n].first).c_str());
00067           if (espn == espm && pn != pm && Interprete::objet_existant(mot))
00068             {
00069               Cerr << "Saturation between fluid " << n << " : " << fluides[n].le_nom() << " and " << m << " : " << fluides[m].le_nom() << finl;
00070               phases_melange[especes[n].first].insert(n), phases_melange[especes[n].first].insert(m);
00071               satn.push_back(&ref_cast(Saturation_base, Interprete::objet(mot)));
00072               if (satn.back()->get_Pref() > 0) //!< pour loi en e = e0 + cp * (T - T0)
00073                 {
00074                   const double hn = pn ? satn.back()->Hvs(satn.back()->get_Pref()) : satn.back()->Hls(satn.back()->get_Pref()),
00075                                hm = pm ? satn.back()->Hvs(satn.back()->get_Pref()) : satn.back()->Hls(satn.back()->get_Pref()),
00076                                T0 = satn.back()->Tsat(satn.back()->get_Pref());
00077                   fluides[n].set_h0_T0(hn, T0), fluides[m].set_h0_T0(hm, T0);
00078                 }
00079             }
00080           else satn.push_back(NULL);
00081         }
00082       tab_saturation.push_back(satn);
00083     }
00084   return is;
00085 }
00086 
00087 std::pair<std::string, int> Milieu_composite::check_fluid_name(const Nom& name)
00088 {
00089   int phase = name.finit_par("gaz");
00090   Nom espece = phase ? name.getPrefix("_gaz") : name.getPrefix("_liquide");
00091 
00092   return std::make_pair(espece.getString(), phase);
00093 }
00094 
00095 bool Milieu_composite::has_saturation(int k, int l) const
00096 {
00097   if (tab_saturation[k][l]) return true;
00098   return false;
00099 }
00100 
00101 Saturation_base& Milieu_composite::get_saturation(int k, int l) const
00102 {
00103   return *(tab_saturation[k][l]);
00104 }

00106 Sortie& Milieu_composite::printOn(Sortie& os) const
00107 {
00108   return os;

00110 
00111 int Milieu_composite::initialiser(const double& temps)
00112 {
00113   for (int i = 0; i < fluides.size(); i++)
00114     fluides[i].initialiser(temps);
00115 
00116   const Equation_base& eqn = equation("temperature");
00117   Champ_Inc_base& ch_rho = ref_cast(Champ_Inc_base, rho.valeur()),
00118                   &ch_e   = ref_cast(Champ_Inc_base, e_int.valeur()),
00119                    &ch_h   = ref_cast(Champ_Inc_base, h.valeur());
00120   ch_rho.associer_eqn(eqn), ch_rho.init_champ_calcule(*this, calculer_masse_volumique);
00121   ch_e.associer_eqn(eqn),   ch_e.init_champ_calcule(*this, calculer_energie_interne);
00122   ch_h.associer_eqn(eqn),   ch_h.init_champ_calcule(*this, calculer_enthalpie);
00123   mettre_a_jour(temps);
00124   return 1;
00125 }

00127 
00128 void Milieu_composite::discretiser(const Probleme_base& pb, const  Discretisation_base& dis)
00129 {
00130   Cerr << "Composite medium discretization." << finl;
00131 
00132   const int N = fluides.size(), nc = pb.equation(0).inconnue()->nb_valeurs_temporelles();
00133   const Zone_dis_base& zone_dis = pb.equation(0).zone_dis();
00134   const double temps = pb.schema_temps().temps_courant();
00135 
00136 // Fluide_base::discretiser(pb, dis);
00137   for (int n = 0; n < N; n++)
00138     fluides[n].discretiser(pb, dis);
00139 
00140   /* masse volumique, energie interne, enthalpie : champ_inc */
00141   Champ_Inc rho_inc, ei_inc, h_inc;
00142   dis.discretiser_champ("champ_elem", zone_dis,       "masse_volumique",    "kg/m^3", N, nc, temps, rho_inc);
00143   dis.discretiser_champ("champ_elem", zone_dis,       "energie_interne",     "J/m^3", N, nc, temps, ei_inc);
00144   dis.discretiser_champ("champ_elem", zone_dis,             "enthalpie",     "J/m^3", N, nc, temps, h_inc);
00145   rho = rho_inc, e_int = ei_inc, h = h_inc;
00146 
00147   /* autres champs : champ_fonc */
00148   dis.discretiser_champ("champ_elem", zone_dis,   "viscosite_dynamique",    "kg/m/s", N, temps,       mu);
00149   dis.discretiser_champ("champ_elem", zone_dis, "viscosite_cinematique",      "m2/s", N, temps,       nu);
00150   dis.discretiser_champ("champ_elem", zone_dis,           "diffusivite",      "m2/s", N, temps,    alpha);
00151   dis.discretiser_champ("champ_elem", zone_dis,          "conductivite",     "W/m/K", N, temps,   lambda);
00152   dis.discretiser_champ("champ_elem", zone_dis,  "capacite_calorifique",    "J/kg/K", N, temps,       Cp);
00153 
00154   /* champs de quantites melange */
00155   for (auto &&kv : phases_melange)
00156     {
00157       dis.discretiser_champ("champ_elem", zone_dis,   Nom("masse_volumique_") + kv.first.c_str() + "_melange", "kg/m^3", 1, temps, rho_m);
00158       dis.discretiser_champ("champ_elem", zone_dis,         Nom("enthalpie_") + kv.first.c_str() + "_melange",  "J/m^3", 1, temps,   h_m);
00159       champs_compris_.ajoute_champ(rho_m);
00160       champs_compris_.ajoute_champ(h_m);
00161     }
00162 
00163   champs_compris_.ajoute_champ(rho);
00164   champs_compris_.ajoute_champ(mu.valeur());
00165   champs_compris_.ajoute_champ(nu.valeur());
00166   champs_compris_.ajoute_champ(alpha.valeur());
00167   champs_compris_.ajoute_champ(lambda.valeur());
00168   champs_compris_.ajoute_champ(Cp.valeur());
00169   champs_compris_.ajoute_champ(e_int);
00170   champs_compris_.ajoute_champ(h);
00171 }
00172 
00173 void Milieu_composite::mettre_a_jour(double temps)
00174 {
00175   for (int i = 0; i < fluides.size(); i++)
00176     fluides[i].mettre_a_jour(temps);
00177   rho.mettre_a_jour(temps);
00178   e_int.mettre_a_jour(temps);
00179   h.mettre_a_jour(temps);
00180 
00181   mu.mettre_a_jour(temps);
00182   nu.mettre_a_jour(temps);
00183   lambda.mettre_a_jour(temps);
00184   alpha.mettre_a_jour(temps);
00185   Cp.mettre_a_jour(temps);
00186   if (rho_m.non_nul()) rho_m.mettre_a_jour(temps);
00187   if (h_m.non_nul()) h_m.mettre_a_jour(temps);
00188   mettre_a_jour_tabs();
00189 // Fluide_base::mettre_a_jour(temps);
00190 }
00191 
00192 void Milieu_composite::mettre_a_jour_tabs()
00193 {
00194   const int N = fluides.size();
00195 
00196   /* viscosite dynamique */
00197   {
00198     DoubleTab& tab = mu.valeurs();
00199     const int Nl = mu.valeurs().dimension_tot(0);
00200     for (int n = 0; n < N; n++)
00201       {
00202         const Champ_base& ch_n = fluides[n].viscosite_dynamique();
00203         const int cch = sub_type(Champ_Uniforme, ch_n);
00204         for (int i = 0; i < Nl; i++) tab(i, n) = ch_n.valeurs()(!cch * i, 0);
00205       }
00206   }
00207 
00208   /* viscosite cinematique */
00209   {
00210     DoubleTab& tab = nu.valeurs();
00211     const int Nl = nu.valeurs().dimension_tot(0);
00212     for (int n = 0; n < N; n++)
00213       {
00214         const Champ_base& ch_n = fluides[n].viscosite_cinematique();
00215         const int cch = sub_type(Champ_Uniforme, ch_n);
00216         for (int i = 0; i < Nl; i++) tab(i, n) = ch_n.valeurs()(!cch * i, 0);
00217       }
00218   }
00219 
00220   /* diffusivite */
00221   {
00222     DoubleTab& tab = alpha.valeurs();
00223     const int Nl = alpha.valeurs().dimension_tot(0);
00224     for (int n = 0; n < N; n++)
00225       {
00226         const Champ_base& ch_n = fluides[n].diffusivite();
00227         const int cch = sub_type(Champ_Uniforme, ch_n);
00228         for (int i = 0; i < Nl; i++) tab(i, n) = ch_n.valeurs()(!cch * i, 0);
00229       }
00230   }
00231 
00232   /* conductivite */
00233   {
00234     DoubleTab& tab = lambda.valeurs();
00235     const int Nl = lambda.valeurs().dimension_tot(0);
00236     for (int n = 0; n < N; n++)
00237       {
00238         const Champ_base& ch_n = fluides[n].conductivite();
00239         const int cch = sub_type(Champ_Uniforme, ch_n);
00240         for (int i = 0; i < Nl; i++) tab(i, n) = ch_n.valeurs()(!cch * i, 0);
00241       }
00242   }
00243 
00244   /* capacite calorifique */
00245   {
00246     DoubleTab& tab = Cp.valeurs();
00247     const int Nl = Cp.valeurs().dimension_tot(0);
00248     for (int n = 0; n < N; n++)
00249       {
00250         const Champ_base& ch_n = fluides[n].capacite_calorifique();
00251         const int cch = sub_type(Champ_Uniforme, ch_n);
00252         for (int i = 0; i < Nl; i++) tab(i, n) = ch_n.valeurs()(!cch * i, 0);
00253       }
00254   }
00255 
00256   if (rho_m.non_nul() && h_m.non_nul())
00257     {
00258       DoubleTab& trm = rho_m.valeurs(), &thm = h_m.valeurs();
00259       trm = 0, thm = 0;
00260 
00261       const Equation_base& eqn = equation("alpha");
00262       const DoubleTab& a = eqn.inconnue().valeurs(),
00263                        &r = rho.valeurs(), &ent = h.valeurs();
00264       const Nom ph = (rho_m.le_nom().getSuffix("masse_volumique_")).getPrefix("_melange");
00265       const int Nl = rho_m.valeurs().dimension_tot(0);
00266 // masse volumique melange
00267       for (auto n : phases_melange[ph.getString()])
00268         for (int i = 0; i < Nl; i++) trm(i) += a(i, n) * r(i, n);
00269 // enthalpie melange
00270       for (auto n : phases_melange[ph.getString()])
00271         for (int i = 0; i < Nl; i++) thm(i) += a(i, n) * r(i, n) * ent(i, n);
00272       for (int i = 0; i < Nl; i++) thm(i) /= trm(i);
00273     }
00274 }
00275 
00276 void Milieu_composite::associer_equation(const Equation_base *eqn) const
00277 {
00278   Fluide_base::associer_equation(eqn);
00279 // on fait suivre aux milieux sous-jacents (les fluide_reel en ont besoin!)
00280   for (int i = 0; i < fluides.size(); i++)
00281     fluides[i].associer_equation(eqn);
00282 }
00283 
00284 int Milieu_composite::check_unknown_range() const
00285 {
00286   int ok = 1;
00287   for (int i = 0; ok && i < fluides.size(); i++) ok &= fluides[i].check_unknown_range(); //chaque fluide controle
00288   return ok;
00289 }
00290 
00291 void Milieu_composite::calculer_masse_volumique(const Objet_U& obj, DoubleTab& val, DoubleTab& bval, tabs_t& deriv)
00292 {
00293   const Milieu_composite& mil = ref_cast(Milieu_composite, obj);
00294   const Zone_VF& zvf = ref_cast(Zone_VF, mil.equation_.begin()->second->zone_dis().valeur());
00295   int i, Ni = val.dimension_tot(0), Nb = bval.dimension_tot(0), n, N = mil.fluides.size();
00296   std::vector<const DoubleTab *> split(N);
00297   for (n = 0; n < N; n++) split[n] = &mil.fluides[n].masse_volumique().valeurs();
00298   for (i = 0; i < Ni; i++) for (n = 0; n < N; n++) val(i, n) = (*split[n])(i * (split[n]->dimension(0) > 1), 0);
00299 
00300   std::vector<DoubleTab> bsplit(N);
00301   for (n = 0; n < N; n++) if (mil.fluides[n].masse_volumique().a_une_zone_dis_base())
00302       bsplit[n] = mil.fluides[n].masse_volumique().valeur_aux_bords();
00303     else bsplit[n].resize(bval.dimension_tot(0), 1), mil.fluides[n].masse_volumique().valeur_aux(zvf.xv_bord(), bsplit[n]);
00304   for (i = 0; i < Nb; i++) for (n = 0; n < N; n++) bval(i, n) = bsplit[n](i * (split[n]->dimension(0) > 1), 0);
00305 
00306   /* derivees */
00307   std::vector<const tabs_t *> split_der(N);
00308   for (n = 0; n < N; n++) split_der[n] = sub_type(Champ_Inc_base, mil.fluides[n].masse_volumique()) ? &ref_cast(Champ_Inc_base, mil.fluides[n].masse_volumique()).derivees() : NULL;
00309   std::set<std::string> noms_der;
00310   for (n = 0; n < N; n++) if (split_der[n]) for (auto &&n_d : *split_der[n]) noms_der.insert(n_d.first);
00311   for (auto &&nom : noms_der)
00312     {
00313       for (n = 0; n < N; n++) split[n] = split_der[n] && split_der[n]->count(nom) ? &split_der[n]->at(nom) : NULL;
00314       DoubleTab& der = deriv[nom];
00315       for (der.resize(Ni, N), i = 0; i < Ni; i++) for (n = 0; n < N; n++) der(i, n) = split[n] ? (*split[n])(i * (split[n]->dimension(0) > 1)) : 0;
00316     }
00317 }
00318 
00319 void Milieu_composite::calculer_energie_interne(const Objet_U& obj, DoubleTab& val, DoubleTab& bval, tabs_t& deriv)
00320 {
00321   const Milieu_composite& mil = ref_cast(Milieu_composite, obj);
00322   int i, Ni = val.dimension_tot(0), Nb = bval.dimension_tot(0), n, N = mil.fluides.size();
00323   std::vector<const DoubleTab *> split(N);
00324   for (n = 0; n < N; n++) split[n] = &mil.fluides[n].energie_interne().valeurs();
00325   for (i = 0; i < Ni; i++) for (n = 0; n < N; n++) val(i, n) = (*split[n])(i * (split[n]->dimension(0) > 1), 0);
00326 
00327   std::vector<DoubleTab> bsplit(N);
00328   for (n = 0; n < N; n++) bsplit[n] = mil.fluides[n].energie_interne().valeur_aux_bords();
00329   for (i = 0; i < Nb; i++) for (n = 0; n < N; n++) bval(i, n) = bsplit[n](i * (split[n]->dimension(0) > 1), 0);
00330 
00331   /* derivees */
00332   std::vector<const tabs_t *> split_der(N);
00333   for (n = 0; n < N; n++) split_der[n] = sub_type(Champ_Inc_base, mil.fluides[n].energie_interne()) ? &ref_cast(Champ_Inc_base, mil.fluides[n].energie_interne()).derivees() : NULL;
00334   std::set<std::string> noms_der;
00335   for (n = 0; n < N; n++) if (split_der[n]) for (auto &&n_d : *split_der[n]) noms_der.insert(n_d.first);
00336   for (auto &&nom : noms_der)
00337     {
00338       for (n = 0; n < N; n++) split[n] = split_der[n] && split_der[n]->count(nom) ? &split_der[n]->at(nom) : NULL;
00339       DoubleTab& der = deriv[nom];
00340       for (der.resize(Ni, N), i = 0; i < Ni; i++) for (n = 0; n < N; n++) der(i, n) = split[n] ? (*split[n])(i * (split[n]->dimension(0) > 1)) : 0;
00341     }
00342 }

00344 void Milieu_composite::calculer_enthalpie(const Objet_U& obj, DoubleTab& val, DoubleTab& bval, tabs_t& deriv)
00345 {
00346   const Milieu_composite& mil = ref_cast(Milieu_composite, obj);
00347   int i, Ni = val.dimension_tot(0), Nb = bval.dimension_tot(0), n, N = mil.fluides.size();
00348   std::vector<const DoubleTab *> split(N);
00349   for (n = 0; n < N; n++) split[n] = &mil.fluides[n].enthalpie().valeurs();
00350   for (i = 0; i < Ni; i++) for (n = 0; n < N; n++) val(i, n) = (*split[n])(i * (split[n]->dimension(0) > 1), 0);
00351 
00352   std::vector<DoubleTab> bsplit(N);
00353   for (n = 0; n < N; n++) bsplit[n] = mil.fluides[n].enthalpie().valeur_aux_bords();
00354   for (i = 0; i < Nb; i++) for (n = 0; n < N; n++) bval(i, n) = bsplit[n](i * (split[n]->dimension(0) > 1), 0);
00355 
00356   /* derivees */
00357   std::vector<const tabs_t *> split_der(N);
00358   for (n = 0; n < N; n++) split_der[n] = sub_type(Champ_Inc_base, mil.fluides[n].enthalpie()) ? &ref_cast(Champ_Inc_base, mil.fluides[n].enthalpie()).derivees() : NULL;
00359   std::set<std::string> noms_der;
00360   for (n = 0; n < N; n++) if (split_der[n]) for (auto &&n_d : *split_der[n]) noms_der.insert(n_d.first);
00361   for (auto &&nom : noms_der)
00362     {
00363       for (n = 0; n < N; n++) split[n] = split_der[n] && split_der[n]->count(nom) ? &split_der[n]->at(nom) : NULL;
00364       DoubleTab& der = deriv[nom];
00365       for (der.resize(Ni, N), i = 0; i < Ni; i++) for (n = 0; n < N; n++) der(i, n) = split[n] ? (*split[n])(i * (split[n]->dimension(0) > 1)) : 0;
00366     }
00367 }
00368 
00369 void Milieu_composite::abortTimeStep()
00370 {
00371   Fluide_base::abortTimeStep();
00372   if (e_int.non_nul()) e_int->abortTimeStep();
00373   if (h.non_nul()) h->abortTimeStep();
00374 }
00375 
00376 bool Milieu_composite::initTimeStep(double dt)
00377 {
00378   for (int i = 0; i < fluides.size(); i++)
00379     fluides[i].initTimeStep(dt);
00380   if (!equation_.size()) return true; //pas d'equation associee -> ???
00381   const Schema_Temps_base& sch = equation_.begin()->second->schema_temps(); //on recupere le schema en temps par la 1ere equation
00382 
00383   /* champs dont on doit creer des cases */
00384   std::vector<Champ_Inc_base *> vch;
00385   if (rho.non_nul() && sub_type(Champ_Inc_base, rho.valeur())) vch.push_back(&ref_cast(Champ_Inc_base, rho.valeur()));
00386   if (e_int.non_nul() && sub_type(Champ_Inc_base, e_int.valeur())) vch.push_back(&ref_cast(Champ_Inc_base, e_int.valeur()));
00387   if (h.non_nul() && sub_type(Champ_Inc_base, h.valeur())) vch.push_back(&ref_cast(Champ_Inc_base, h.valeur()));
00388 
00389   for (auto &pch : vch) for (int i = 1; i <= sch.nb_valeurs_futures(); i++)
00390       pch->changer_temps_futur(sch.temps_futur(i), i), pch->futur(i) = pch->valeurs();
00391   return true;
00392 }
